NC(D)J2, Miniature Stainless Steel Cylinder, Single Acting, Single Rod
branchItem.description: <p> Series NCJ2 single rod, single acting, miniature cylinders. Available in bore sizes 6, 10, 16mm. Basic, foot, front flange and double rear clevis mounting options. Available in spring return and spring extend.</p>
